meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Terry O'Shea Tucker Pope Kevin Shen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6780.

td.p: Terry O'Shea, a sophomore at Princeton University from Bridgewater, New Jersey (subtotal of $19,800)
Tucker Pope, a junior from Texas A&M University from Lubbock, Texas (subtotal of $14,800)
Kevin Shen, a junior from the University of California, Berkeley from Cupertino, California (subtotal of $8,765)

tr.td: NO COOKING REQUIRED
GLOBAL STUDIES
"H"OMONYMS
MONEY TALKS
NOTABLE NAMES
JOHNNY GILBERT PERFORMS TODAY'S HITS
(Alex: You have to name the performer more closely associated with the tune.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '...to make this fermented cabbage dish with a German name that\'s popularly served with hot dogs')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: ...to make this fermented cabbage dish with a German name that's popularly served with hot dogs

Tucker

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Kevin
Tucker
Terry
FICTIONAL COLLEGES & UNIVERSITIES
PUT IT THERE
WHAT'S YOUR MAJOR?
COUPLING ON TV
(Alex: You have to identify the show that features each romance we tell you about.)
"ONY" BALONEY
FIGURING OUT THE UNIVERSE
(Sarah: The Sanford Underground Research Facility In South Dakota is doing cutting-edge experiments almost a mile down.)

Tucker

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Kevin, uh, you had no money, so you couldn\'t participate in the Final today. But yesterday you earned $8,765. And looks like that\'s gonna get bumped up to a third place $25,000.)
TerryWhat is Gibraltar?
$5,000
TuckerWhat is Hong Kong?
$13,200
Gibraltar')

Terry

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
